sentences.english: The issue of the conflict isn't as black and white from the lens of the priest in the temple.

sentences.english: Population, and lasting historical legacies have all contributed to these dichotomies .
sentences.chinese: 人口和持久的历史遗产，都促成了这种两分法。

definition: dualism, belief that the universe is made of two different substance (e.g. mind and matter or good and evil)
dialectics/dialectic or Socratic method of debate
epistemology (in philosophy, the theory of how we know things)
objectivist philosophy
monism, belief that the universe is made of a single substance
either this or that/one or the other
pluralism, philosophical doctrine that the universe consists of different substances
theory of reflection (in dialectic materialism), i.e. every perception reflects physical reality
historical materialism (Marx's theory of history)
